data:
Here are examples of ideas for an AI product: Features: 'Real-time alerts', 'Data analytics'. Architecture: 'Modular design', 'Scalable infrastructure'.
Generate at least 20 ideas (3 words maximum) for each of these categories: Features, Architecture, Risks, Business (Goals, Markets, Users, Targets). 

Highlight key ideas for each category using the following information: %%source

Provide the results as two lists per category, where one of them will contain all the ideas, while the other will contain only the key ideas.
